argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | drnginvrl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | drnginvrl.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | drnginvrl.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | drnginvrl.u | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 5 |  | drnginvrl.i | |- I = ( invr ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 7 | 1, 6, 2 | #P_drngunit | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( X e. ( Unit ` R ) <-> ( X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_drngring | |- ( R e. DivRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 9 | 6, 5, 3, 4 | #P_unitrinv | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. ( Unit ` R ) ) -> ( X .x. ( I ` X ) ) = .1. ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ex | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( X e. ( Unit ` R ) -> ( X .x. ( I ` X ) ) = .1. ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( X e. ( Unit ` R ) -> ( X .x. ( I ` X ) ) = .1. ) ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_sylbird | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( ( X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) -> ( X .x. ( I ` X ) ) = .1. ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3impib | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) -> ( X .x. ( I ` X ) ) = .1. ) |
